Welcome to Hestia Funds!

Hestia Funds is a budgeting and spending planner application inspired by the Greek goddess of hearth and home. My mission is to help you track your finances, visualize your expenses, and set meaningful savings goals.

Use the navigation on the right to explore transactions, view stats and charts, and manage your categories. Let's get started on your journey to financial wellness!
